#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define MAXSIZE 10000
 
using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, i;
	char *s;
	char A[ 27 ];

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {
		
		s = new char[ MAXSIZE ];
		bzero( A, sizeof( A ) );

		scanf("\n%[^\n]s", s );	
		scanf("%s", A );
		
		for( i = 0;s[ i ];i++ )
			if( ( s[ i ] >= 'A' ) &&  ( s[ i ] <= 'Z' ) )
				printf("%c", A[ s[ i ] - 65 ] );		
			else 
				printf("%c", s[ i ] );

		printf("\n");

		delete s;
	}
	return 0;
}
